activities:
ZyLAB North America, LLC ("ZyLAB") acts as data processor on behalf of its corporate clients and/or their legal counsel ("Clients") during its provision of electronic discovery services and related consulting ("Services"). From time to time ZyLAB will also act as data processor on behalf of its affiliates to aid them in their provision of Services to clients in their respective European countries. Personal information is collected in the EU (i) by the Client directly or by ZyLAB's personnel at the Client's direction or (ii) sent to ZyLAB in the United States by the Client or a ZyLAB's affiliates for processing. Data is then housed on secure servers in the United States which only ZyLAB's personnel who have a need to access such information for the purpose of performing the Services may access. During its performance of Services ZyLAB takes direction from its Clients as to what data it is authorized to process. ZyLAB's clients may also provide Personal Information to ZyLAB via its web-sites, including signing-up for various communications and offers from ZyLAB or for 
the purpose of purchasing those products and services ZyLAB offers for direct purchase via its web-sites. ZyLAB uses such data for 
the purposes of marketing, facilitating transactions and customer support.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, North America Sales and Marketing
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data, off-line data, manually processed data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC
